title: AlzGuard - Alzheimer's Detection
description: Engineered the frontend and AI model for an Alzheimer's detection tool for physicians, which won a $1000 at YIC
features: AI-powered Alzheimer's detection using machine learning
Medical image analysis and processing

Real-time diagnostic results and recommendations

title: Voice Synthesis AI - AI-Powered Voice Generation
description: Built a modern full-stack web app that leverages AI to generate high-quality voice overs for short-form videos featuring custom topic generation and more.
features: AI-powered voice synthesis using ElevenLabs API
Custom topic generation with Gemini AI
High-quality voice over generation for videos
Audio transcription and processing with Assembly AI
Cloud storage integration with AWS S3
User authentication and session management
highlights: Integrated ElevenLabs for realistic voice synthesis
Built scalable backend with PostgreSQL and Drizzle ORM
Implemented secure file storage with AWS S3
Created seamless user experience with Clerk authentication
Optimized audio processing pipeline for performance
Deployed full-stack application with modern tech stack
challenges: Managing large audio file uploads and processing
Optimizing voice synthesis API response times

Balancing audio quality with processing speed

title: RoboAdvisor - Stock Market Prediction
description: An AI-driven robo-advisor for stock market predictions, providing users with insights and recommendations based on real-time data analysis. Used modern portfolio theory and stochastic optimization to beat the market (S&P 500).
features: Real-time stock market data analysis
AI-driven predictions and recommendations
User-friendly dashboard with visualizations
Portfolio tracking and management
highlights: Integrated multiple stock market APIs for comprehensive data
Created responsive charts with Matplotlib
Used modern portfolio theory for investment strategies
Achieved higher returns than S&P 500 benchmark
Optimized strategy using options data and market sentiment
challenges: Handling large volumes of real-time data
Ensuring accuracy of AI predictions
Designing intuitive user interfaces for complex data

title: LearnETF - GeeseHacks 2025 Winner

title: Full-Stack Portfolio Website
description: A sophisticated, modern portfolio website built with Next.js 15 and advanced architectural patterns. Features real-time LinkedIn data integration, custom animation systems, PostgreSQL database, admin dashboard, and microservice API architecture for scalable content management.
features: Real-time LinkedIn work experience integration via custom API
Advanced animation system with Motion (Framer Motion successor) and custom blur-fade components
PostgreSQL database with Prisma ORM for data persistence and caching
Admin dashboard for content management and cache refresh functionality
Microservice architecture with Python FastAPI backend for LinkedIn scraping
Theme-aware magic card components with gradient animations
Advanced search and filtering system for projects
SEO optimization with Next.js 15 App Router and metadata API
Responsive design with Tailwind CSS 4 and Radix UI primitives
highlights: Architected full-stack application with Next.js 15 App Router and React 19
Built custom LinkedIn scraping microservice using Python, FastAPI, and Playwright
Implemented PostgreSQL database with Prisma ORM for efficient data management
Created sophisticated animation system using Motion library with custom components
Developed admin dashboard with cache management and real-time data refresh
Integrated Radix UI primitives for accessible, production-ready components
Optimized performance with Turbopack bundling and advanced image optimization
Deployed scalable architecture with containerized microservices
challenges: Designing scalable microservice architecture for LinkedIn data scraping
Implementing secure authentication and rate limiting for API endpoints
Creating performant custom animation components while maintaining accessibility
Managing complex state synchronization between frontend cache and database
Optimizing PostgreSQL queries and implementing efficient caching strategies
